# grantory_register (Resource)
Manage the lifecycle of the `grantory_register` resource.

## Example
```terraform
resource "grantory_register" "server_ip" {
  host_id = grantory_host.app.host_id

  payload = jsonencode({
    ip = "10.0.0.5"
  })

  labels = {
    env = "prod"
  }
}
```


## Schema

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

- `host_id` (String) Host identifier that owns the register entry.

### Optional

- `payload` (String) JSON-encoded payload that describes the registered item.
- `labels` (Map of String) Optional labels that tag the register entry.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
